titles.title: A resolution honoring Dr. Jane Goodall and her legacy as an ethologist, conservationist, and activist.
A resolution honoring Dr. Jane Goodall and her legacy as an ethologist, conservationist, and activist.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This resolution proclaims April 3, 2024, as Jane Goodall Day and expresses gratitude for her dedication to the well-being of animals, conservation, and the planet as a whole.
